Contributor: Heyer, H. (Hermann), artist.; Liberty Loan Committee.;
Note: Signed "H. Heyer." Date based on the date of the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign. Orientation: Vertical.
Description: Design for newspaper and magazine advertisement for the Fourth Liberty Loan campaign.  The text says that "in the veins of our brave boys runs the same red blood that has written liberty and justice across the pages of history."  The illustration shows two veterans (of the Civil War?) flanking a doughboy.
Digital Collection: Allied Posters of World War I
Local Rights Statement: This material is made available for private study, scholarship, and research use. For access to the original or a high resolution reproduction, contact: Temple University Libraries, Special Collections Research Center, scrc@temple.edu, 215-204-8257.

Title: It's in the blood
